entry.def: An undercoat is a covering of paint or varnish put onto a surface as a base for a final covering of paint or varnish.

means.word_mean: 1. seal consisting of a coating of a tar or rubberlike material on the underside of a motor vehicle to retard corrosion
2. the first or preliminary coat of paint or size applied to a surface
3. thick soft fur lying beneath the longer and coarser guard hair
